English:
Title: Indiscreet 
Genre: Comedy. Romance | Romantic comedy. 
Year: 1958. 
Country: USA. UU. 
Duration: 96 min. 
Director: Stanley Donen. 
Screenplay: Norman Krasna. 
Production: Warner Bros. Pictures 
Music: Richard Rodney Bennett. 
Photo: Freddie Young. 
Starring: Cary Grant, Ingrid Bergman, Phyllis Calvert, Cecil Parker, David Kossoff, Megs Jenkins 

Synopsis: 
A famous actress meets a sleek and wealthy businessman, and both are immediately attracted. He confesses he is married and his wife refuses to divorce. Nevertheless, they start a happy and romantic relationship. 


The film develops a romantic comedy between two people with past love experiences and ages over 30 who fall in love as schoolboys, which brings elements of humor and reflection on relationships between age ls and true love. It is remarkable Christian Dior wardrobe for Anna, who sought to combine the elegance and innovation on the current fashion. The story contains elements of transgression, which raise the tone of the story and arouse public interest. Philip extramarital love is explained in subtleties and detours to avoid censorship. This did not allow the inclusion of a bed scene of the lovers, the director replaced by a double image in which they are separated by a thin vertical suture line. The tangle of truths and lies kindles the interest of the story.
